thread.title: Kwara Gov greets Christians at Easter
thread.title_full: Kwara Gov greets Christians at Easter

author: Biola Azeez
title: Kwara Gov greets Christians at Easter
text: Governor Abdulrahman Abdulrazaq of Kwara State has sent felicitations to the Christian community in the state and across Nigeria for the Easter celebration. In a statement by his Chief Press Secretary (CPS), Rafiu Ajakaye, the governor said that Easter evokes the time-tested themes of love, sacrifice, compassion, unity, and the triumph of good over evil at different times. “The sacrifice of Jesus Christ to guide the flock and the enduring legacy he left for humanity call for deeper reflection at this time and always,” the governor says. “He urged citizens to seize the moment to renew their faith in God, unite for national and collective growth, and help one another to uphold goodness and justice in the world. “The Governor wishes the Christian community a happy Easter celebration.”.
